title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Fry the pancetta or bacon in a pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs, grated Parmesan, and Pecorino with a generous amount of black pepper.
Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and add to the pan with bacon.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding a bit of pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Serve with additional grated cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or cook the chicken pieces until browned.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste until golden.
Add pureed tomatoes, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and salt.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then add the grilled chicken and cook for another 10 minutes.
Stir in the heavy cream and simmer for 5 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and a creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: Toss the chopped lettuce with olive oil and garlic.
Add croutons, grated Parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh basil, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°C (482°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly on the dough.
Top with slices of fresh mozzarella and a few basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with a pinch of salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Top with fresh basil leaves and serve.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A creamy Russian dish featuring sautéed beef served with a sour cream sauce over noodles or rice.
ingredients: Egg noodles or rice, for serving
instructions: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add the beef strips and cook until browned.
Sprinkle flour over the beef and stir for 1 minute.
Pour in the beef broth and let it simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in the sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Serve the beef stroganoff over cooked egg noodles or rice.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Delicious sushi rolls made with rice, nori, fresh fish, and vegetables.
instructions: Cook the sushi rice according to package instructions and season with rice vinegar.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat.
Spread a thin layer of rice over the nori, leaving a 2cm border at the top.
Place fish, cucumber, and avocado along the bottom edge.
Roll tightly and slice into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: A rich and flavorful soup made with caramelized onions and beef broth, topped with melted cheese.
instructions: Heat butter and olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the onions and cook until caramelized, about 30 minutes.
Deglaze the pot with white wine and add the beef broth.
Simmer for 15 minutes, then season with salt and pepper.
Toast the baguette slices and place on top of the soup.
Top with shredded Gruyère and broil until melted and bubbly.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with eggs, tofu, shrimp, peanuts, and a tangy sauce.
instructions: Cook the rice noodles according to the package instructions.
Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry the tofu and shrimp until cooked.
Push the tofu and shrimp to one side and scramble the eggs on the other side.
Add the cooked noodles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar.
Stir everything together and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and chopped cilantro.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A decadent chocolate dessert with a gooey molten center, best served warm with ice cream.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Melt the chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl.
Whisk eggs, egg yolks, sugar, and salt until fluffy.
Stir in the melted chocolate mixture and fold in the flour.
Pour the batter into greased ramekins and bake for 12-14 minutes.
Serve immediately with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A simple yet delicious dish with mashed avocado on toasted bread, topped with seasonings and extras.
instructions: Toast the bread to your desired crispiness.
Mash the avocado with a fork and mix in olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes, if desired.
